title: Guess your main!!
body:
So here are the rules!

1. You get to make three clues
2. The First clue must be a quote from the champion
3. The Second clue must be the description of a move in your own words. Make it sound funny or more OP then it actually is to throw people off. For example ({{champion:432}} - Tempered Fate - "EVERYBODY. STOP WHAT YOU ARE DOING. YES YOU TOO BARON STOP")
4. The Third clue should be something from the champions lore but in your own words.

And thats the game.

replies.body: can you guess my main without any hints? I bet you can.

Viktor, obviously
He made the battlecast skins

1-Violence is elegance

2-Discount revive passive

3- In the lore i am a war god but in game i'm awful after my rework
